hint.text: To locate a point (x,y), move x units towards the right on the x-axis from origin. Then move y units upwards.

solution.text:
Here, _{j}_ is the x co-ordinate and _{k}_ is the y co-ordinate.
Hence, we move _{j}_ units towards the right on x axis from the origin and then move _{k}_ units upwards.
Therefore, the given co-ordinates (_{j}_,_{k}_) correspond to point _{l}_

content.text: To which letter do the co-ordinates (_{j}_,_{k}_) correspond to?
